# Exponential smoothing

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, tidymodels, here, forecast, tseries, tictoc)
data <- read_csv(here("data", "main.csv")) %>% rename("date" = fecha)
ipc <- ts(data %>% select(ipc), start = c(2005, 1), frequency = 12)
```

```{r}
train <- 
    ts(data %>% 
         filter(between(date, as.Date("2005-01-01"), as.Date("2019-12-02"))) %>% 
         select(ipc), start = c(2005, 1), frequency = 12)
```

```{r}
ets(ipc)
ets(ipc) %>% checkresiduals()
ets(ipc) %>% forecast(24) %>% autoplot()
```

```{r}
holt(ipc, damped = TRUE)
holt(ipc, damped = TRUE) %>% checkresiduals()
holt(ipc, damped = TRUE) %>% forecast(24) %>% autoplot()
```

```{r}
hw(ipc, seasonal = "additive")
hw(ipc, seasonal = "additive") %>% checkresiduals()
hw(ipc, seasonal = "additive") %>% forecast(24) %>% autoplot()
```

```{r}
thetaf(ipc)
thetaf(ipc) %>% checkresiduals()
thetaf(ipc) %>% forecast(24) %>% autoplot()
```
